meanings.definition: A person who wants to be like someone else.
meanings.sent1: The wannabee admired the singer's style and tried to copy it.
meanings.sent2: She was a wannabee actress who dreamt of being on the big screen one day.
meanings.sent3: The wannabee comedian tried to tell jokes like the famous stand-up star.
meanings.sent4: He was a wannabee chef, always experimenting in the kitchen to match his idol's skills.
meanings.sent5: The young girl was a wannabee artist, painting every day to improve her craft.

meanings.definition: A person who aspires to be a member of a particular group or profession.
meanings.sent1: The young student was a wannabee scientist, conducting experiments in her backyard.
meanings.sent2: He was a wannabee firefighter, always ready to help others in need.
meanings.sent3: The wannabee astronaut built a spaceship out of cardboard boxes for fun.
meanings.sent4: She was a wannabee doctor, bandaging her toys and pretending to give them medicine.
meanings.sent5: The wannabee pilot loved playing with toy planes and dreaming of flying high in the sky.
